title: Pulsefire Caitlyn hint on PBE?

embed.description: This is a W ORK I N P ROGRESS POST.] [ Status: The PBE currently still down for maintenance.] The PBE has been updated! As we continue the 7.9/midseason PBE cycle, today's post includes a new Dark Star Login theme, a Pulsefire audio teaser, and more! Continue reading for more information!

body:
"Pulsefire Teaser
A mysterious new voice teaser is now on the PBE. Pulsefire Ezreal requests a diagnostic ran when an accented voice interrupts the transmission by saying "Nowhere to hide".

"Nowhere to hide" is a line in Caitlyn's VO. 

To trigger the teaser, simply go into a game with Pulsefire Ezreal and move to play the new audio."

Guess more of the leak is correct.

replies.body: So would that also mean Caitlyn is the next champ to receive a Lux style VO? I hope she has a taunt for MF if she does.

> [{quoted}](name=GalaxySoul,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=srY3mwgU,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-04-27T23:58:47.044+0000)
>
> It would be cool if the voice tone changed... her voice is kinda lame! :/
> 
> But either way this will be a must have skin for her, considering she only has one skin that changes the particle effects of her abilities (Lunar Wraith)! 
> {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

They probably might for the legendary skin but not for he base skin if she does get ghe lux style VO. Either way can't wait for this skin! (And hopefully no more "Boom! Headshot!")
